name: Dreamwalker Tunic
tooltip:
Dreamwalker TunicLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Dreamwalker Tunic if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Tunic, 25 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 6 Cured Rugged Hides and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Tunic
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 25
- Cured Rugged Hide x 6
- Nexus Crystal x 2
